title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.217 - Nonoperating revenue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.217 - Nonoperating revenue

State Regulations

The revenue of a hospital which is not directly related
to patient care, related patient services, or the sale of related goods. For
example, nonoperating revenue includes unrestricted gifts, unrestricted income
from endowment funds, gain on sale of hospital properties, and retail operation
revenue. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.217

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
